div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1354 Caria, 1934 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (M) Contents: 273 AR Halicarnassus: 25 dr. (as BMC 43 ff.) 1 hemidr. (as BMC 48) 78 fr. (as BMC 49 ff.) Myndus: 90 dr. (as BMC 1 ff.) 7 hemidr. (as BMC 9 ff.) 64 fr. (as BMC 13 ff.) Illeg.: 1 dr.; 7 fr. Disposition: Ankara (inv. no. 1138) Information from Saadet Taner
